mapper.select: select id, project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, jar_type, jar_path_hash, jar_full_path, jar_file_name, last_modified, jar_hash from lv_invoke_jar_info where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into lv_invoke_jar_info(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, jar_type, jar_path_hash, jar_full_path, jar_file_name, last_modified, jar_hash) values (#{projectId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{isDeleted}, #{jarType}, #{jarPathHash}, #{jarFullPath}, #{jarFileName}, #{lastModified}, #{jarHash})

insert into lv_invoke_jar_info(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, jar_type, jar_path_hash, jar_full_path, jar_file_name, last_modified, jar_hash) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.jarType}, #{entity.jarPathHash}, #{entity.jarFullPath}, #{entity.jarFileName}, #{entity.lastModified}, #{entity.jarHash})

insert into lv_invoke_jar_info(project_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted, jar_type, jar_path_hash, jar_full_path, jar_file_name, last_modified, jar_hash) values
(#{entity.projectId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.isDeleted}, #{entity.jarType}, #{entity.jarPathHash}, #{entity.jarFullPath}, #{entity.jarFileName}, #{entity.lastModified}, #{entity.jarHash})
on duplicate key update project_id = values(project_id), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), is_deleted = values(is_deleted), jar_type = values(jar_type), jar_path_hash = values(jar_path_hash), jar_full_path = values(jar_full_path), jar_file_name = values(jar_file_name), last_modified = values(last_modified), jar_hash = values(jar_hash)
mapper.update:
update lv_invoke_jar_info
project_id = #{projectId},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted},
jar_type = #{jarType},
jar_path_hash = #{jarPathHash},
jar_full_path = #{jarFullPath},
jar_file_name = #{jarFileName},
last_modified = #{lastModified},
jar_hash = #{jarHash},
where id = #{id}
